item.title: On the Complexity of Learning Sparse Functions with Statistical and Gradient Queries
item.description: Learning sparse functions efficiently with gradient methods is challenging; this paper introduces Differentiable Learning Queries (DLQ) to precisely characterize gradient query complexity, revealing s…

item.title: Strategic Littlestone Dimension: Improved Bounds on Online Strategic Classification
